overview: The fool Siri Guleng's parents both died, and he lives with his younger brother and sister-in-law. This makes the poor life of this family even worse. Until the fool brought back a sheep, his sister-in-law had the selfish desire to sell the sheep secretly. The cowardly brother reluctantly acquiesced in this matter. The fool found the sheep was not at home and look for it all the way. In the end, he only recovered one sheep's head.
title: Exile
